newsitem.title: TURKEY: Turkey sells 229.1 trln 10-mth bills at 125.08 pct.
newsitem.headline: Turkey sells 229.1 trln 10-mth bills at 125.08 pct.

text.p: The Turkish Treasury sold 229.1 trillion lira worth of 308-day (10-month) t-bills at a maximum yield of 125.08 percent (including withholding tax), after it sold 290.2 trillion lira of nine-month bills at 124.47 percent in its July 1 auction.

Banks will pay 113 trillion lira to the Treasury on Wednesday when the treasury will repay 104 trillion lira in bond redemptions and coupon payments. The central bank will also repay 31.4 trillion lira for maturing reverse repos on the open market on Wednesday.
